title: 关于GlobalMarket插件
author: Uncle_Hong
txt_content: GlobalMarket插件版本2.0.0.28，权限都添加完，普通玩家还是没相应的权限，求解！

replies.author: 冰星
replies.txt_content: 截图一下权限插件的配置

replies.author: Uncle_Hong
replies.txt_content:
Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -essentials.nick
    - -essentials.sethome
    - -essentials.warp
    - -essentials.hat
    - -essentials.suicide
    - -essentials.me
    - -essentials.pt
    - -essentials.powertool
    - -essentials.format
    - -essentials.chat.format
    - -essentials.msg.format
    - -essentials.chat.color
    - -essentials.tpa
    - -essentials.tpahere
    - -essentials.home
    - at.use
    - automessage.receive.*
    - automessage.receive.regular
    - chestcommands.item.RPG.yml
    - chestcommands.open.RPG.yml
    - clans.use
    - essentials.home
    - garbagebin.bin
    - globalmarket.command.create
    - globalmarket.command.send
    - globalmarket.command_create
    - GlobalMarket.create
    - globalmarket.quicklist
    - globalmarket.quickmail
    - globalmarket.send
    - globalmarket.use
    - guilds.command.accept
    - guilds.command.ally
    - guilds.command.bank
    - guilds.command.boot
    - guilds.command.buff
    - guilds.command.cancel
    - guilds.command.chat
    - guilds.command.check
    - guilds.command.decline
    - guilds.command.delete
    - guilds.command.demote
    - guilds.command.help
    - guilds.command.info
    - guilds.command.inspect
    - guilds.command.invite
    - guilds.command.list
    - guilds.command.prefix
    - guilds.command.promote
    - guilds.command.status
    - guilds.command.transfer
    - guilds.command.vault
    - guirepair.repair
    - horses.command.buy
    - horses.command.summon
    - levels.use
    - levels.user
    - magicspells.notarget
    - magicspells.rank.*
    - magicspells.silent
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.zhizhu
    - MyPet.user.extended.CanFeed
    - MyPet.user.leash.spider
    - MyPet.user.release
    - nobreak.speak
    - pv.hide
    - pv.show
    - pvptoggle.player.use
    - quickshop.use
    - scriptblock.interact.use
    - scriptblock.walk.use
    - serversigns.use.*
    - sms.set
    - team.create
    - toolandfoodfx.use.food
    - treasurechest.access
    - treasurechest.access.treasure
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&2'
      suffix: ''
不是在这里添加权限，是在groups里面添加，groups在wrold文件夹里面
